scripts.build-es6: webpack --env mode=production --env target=ES6 --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-es5: webpack --env mode=production --env target=ES5 --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-all: webpack --env mode=production --env target=ES6 --config webpack.config.js && webpack --env mode=production --env target=ES5 --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-files
